text.title: Stand by me: Music legend Ben E King dies at 76
text.head: Stand by me: Music legend Ben E King dies at 76
Sources

list.item: AFP. "'Stand by Me' singer and soul legend Ben E King dies aged 76" — Nine News , May 2, 2015
"Ben E King: R&B legend dies at 76" — BBC News Online , May 1, 2015
Hannah Furness. "Stand by Me singer Ben E King Dies at 76" — The Daily Telegraph , May 1, 2015
